name: Haunting of Hollow Wood
description:
Warning: If you die in this game you become an enemy in the level! Ghosts have been seen lurking around Hollow Wood. You are here to stop them. But be careful, because if you die, you join them in their haunting!

Made for the second Kindred Community Jam with the theme: "Death is a new Beginning".

The game has partial controller support (keyboard required for some menus)

Asset packs used:

[SCANS] Abandoned Factory Buildings - Day/Night Scene (by Scans Factory)

Ancient Treasures (by Dekogon Studios)

ANIMAL VARIETY PACK (by PROTOFACTOR INC)

Brushify - Environment Shaders Pack (by JoeGarth)

Dark Forest (by Dave Berg)

Environment Set (by NatureManufacture)

GOOD SKY (by UNEASY)

Horror Engine (by tansuergene)

Landscape Backgrounds (by Gokhan Karadayi)

Weeper Pack PBR (by Infinity PBR)

Human characters and animations from Mixamo.com

 

Bump in the Night by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3465-bump-in-the-night

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

 

Ready Aim Fire by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5001-ready-aim-fire

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
